RelatedSentence: India will join 25 other countries at the meeting of regional grouping Conference on Interaction and Confidence Building Measures in Asia ( CICA ) in Shanghai beginning tomorrow where a number of issues like security and peace and stability in Asian region will be deliberated upon .
The Indian delegation would be led by Dinkar Khullar , Secretary ( West ) in the Ministry of External Affairs .
India 's participation underlines its active contribution to Asian security and its historical and mutually - beneficial ties with Central Asia .
It has 24 members and Bangladesh and Qatar will join CICA as its newest members at the Shanghai Summit .

A1: The first two summits of CICA
RelatedSentence: The first two summits of CICA were hosted by Kazakhstan and the third summit was held in Istanbul in 2010 when Turkey assumed chairmanship of CICA .
